text: Gawker was an American news site and blog founded in 2002 and based in New York City. The site had over 23 million visits per month as of 2015."Gawker.com" SimilarWeb. Retrieved June 28, 2015. It was the main blog of Gawker Media, a media company. Currently, Gawker is owned by Meng Ru Kuok. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2002 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in New York (state) Category:American news websites Category:New York City
title: Gawker
